___consumables.description: The maximum length of time that this vehicle can provide consumables for its entire crew without having to resupply.

___cost_in_credits.description: The cost of this vehicle new, in galactic credits.

___pilots.description: An array of People URL Resources that this vehicle has been piloted by.

___manufacturer.description: The manufacturer of this vehicle. Comma seperated if more than one.

___max_atmosphering_speed.description: The maximum speed of this vehicle in atmosphere.

___vehicle_class.description: The class of this vehicle, such as Wheeled.

___created.description: The ISO 8601 date format of the time that this resource was created.

___cargo_capacity.description: The maximum number of kilograms that this vehicle can transport.

___name.description: The name of this vehicle. The common name, such as Sand Crawler.

___url.description: The hypermedia URL of this resource.

___crew.description: The number of personnel needed to run or pilot this vehicle.

___length.description: The length of this vehicle in meters.

___edited.description: the ISO 8601 date format of the time that this resource was edited.

___model.description: The model or official name of this vehicle. Such as All Terrain Attack Transport.

___films.description: An array of Film URL Resources that this vehicle has appeared in.

___passengers.description: The number of non-essential people this vehicle can transport.
